item.title: 南卡罗来纳州的一名司机被迫倒车，躲避一个意想不到的道路障碍--一只好斗的火鸡扇动着羽毛，啄向挡在它前面的汽车。
item.description:
A driver in South Carolina was forced to hit reverse and evade an unexpected road obstacle — a combative turkey fanning its feathers and pecking at the car in its path. https://t.co/cWJf37WjJ4 pic.twitter.com/02xNtagADQ

— ABC News (@ABC) March 14, 2024

item.title: 美国图书馆协会发布的新数据凸显了图书馆和学校因图书禁令和其他挑战而面临的日益激烈的斗争。
item.description:
New data released by the American Library Association highlights the growing battle libraries and schools face over book bans and other challenges. https://t.co/7GApkT69bS

— ABC News (@ABC) March 14, 2024

item.title: 百思买周四宣布召回其内部品牌 Insignia 的空气炸锅和空气炸炉。
item.description:
Best Buy announced Thursday it is recalling air fryers and air fryer ovens from its in-house Insignia brand. https://t.co/idxb3CKtay

— ABC News (@ABC) March 14, 2024

item.title: 田纳西州酒精饮料委员会表示，它正在调查失踪大学生莱利-斯特恩（Riley Strain）在纳什维尔夜游失踪前是否被超量饮酒。
item.description:
The Tennessee Alcoholic Beverage Commission said it is investigating whether missing college student Riley Strain was overserved before he vanished during a night out in Nashville. https://t.co/wfm7Q8X4fs

item.title: 据司法部称，一名前共享单车司机因认为一名乘客是犹太人或以色列人而对其发起攻击，现已被捕。
item.description:
A former ride-share driver has been arrested after launching an attack on a passenger because he perceived the individual to be Jewish or Israeli, according to the Justice Department. https://t.co/1i77wo71yg pic.twitter.com/wzpQDEpLjq

— ABC News (@ABC) March 14, 2024

item.title: 鸟瞰图显示，在加利福尼亚州洛杉矶市谢尔曼奥克斯（Sherman Oaks）社区，山体滑坡摧毁了一栋房屋，并损坏了另外两栋房屋。最近的暴雨很可能是造成山体滑坡的原因之一，导致一些居民撤离....。
item.description:
An aerial view shows a pool remaining above a large fissure after a landslide destroyed one home and damaged two others in the Sherman Oaks neighborhood in Los Angeles, California.Recent heavy rains likely played a role in the landslide, prompting several residents to evacuate.… pic.twitter.com/6Z2ynf2Vp0

— ABC News (@ABC) March 14, 2024

item.title: 以色列总理本雅明-内塔尼亚胡的政党利库德集团发表声明，回应参议院多数党领袖查克-舒默呼吁以色列重新举行选举，通过两国解决方案促进地区和平。
item.description:
Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu's party, Likud, released a statement in response to Senate Majority Leader Chuck Schumer calling for a new election in Israel to promote peace in the region via a two-state solution. https://t.co/RaRVGvF5ML pic.twitter.com/9pCK1ftPxJ

— ABC News (@ABC) March 14, 2024

item.title: 周四袭击落基山脉的大暴风雪已成为丹佛都会区今年最大的暴风雪：
item.description:
A major snowstorm slamming the Rockies on Thursday has become the Denver metro area's biggest snowstorm of the year.

See the latest forecast: https://t.co/KuNxZjOpiH

— ABC News (@ABC) March 14, 2024

item.title: 尽管一项已有 30 年历史的联邦法律命令数十所美国大学、历史学会和博物馆清点这些圣物并立即归还部落，但它们仍然拥有美国原住民的遗骸和陪葬品。
item.description:
Dozens of American universities, historical societies and museums are in possession of Native American human remains and burial objects despite a 30-year-old federal law ordering them to inventory the sacred objects and immediately return them to tribes. https://t.co/y2BYprf3pH pic.twitter.com/np6gLrnHCR

— ABC News (@ABC) March 14, 2024

item.title: 爆料：坎农法官驳回前总统特朗普要求驳回联邦机密文件案的动议。
item.description:

item.title: 最新消息：纽约一名联邦法官拒绝驳回对参议员鲍勃-梅嫩德斯（Bob Menendez）的贿赂指控，裁定他的行为不受其作为美国参议员或外交关系委员会时任主席的工作性质的保护。
item.description:
BREAKING: A federal judge in New York declined to dismiss bribery charges against Sen. Bob Menendez, ruling his conduct is not protected by the nature of his job as a U.S. senator or as then-chairman of the Foreign Relations Committee. https://t.co/2XqxUT2urw pic.twitter.com/lmr4OKhQ4l

— ABC News (@ABC) March 14, 2024

item.title: 科学家们正在进一步了解哪些肉类来源可以作为牛肉、猪肉和鸡肉的更可持续的替代品，其中包括蟒蛇肉，据研究人员称，蟒蛇肉可以提供一种碳密集度低得多的肉类。
item.description:
Scientists are learning more about what sources of meat could serve as more sustainable alternatives to beef, pork and chicken — including python meat, which could offer a form of meat that is much less carbon intensive, according to researchers. https://t.co/MrsMuUsCen pic.twitter.com/XiAsmKX1AE

— ABC News (@ABC) March 14, 2024

item.title: 纽约联邦法官拒绝驳回对新泽西州参议员鲍勃-梅嫩德斯（Bob Menendez）的贿赂指控。
item.description:

— ABC News (@ABC) March 14, 2024

item.title: 公牛鲨是世界上最具攻击性的鲨鱼物种之一，其数量在 20 年间大幅增加，研究人员称，海水变暖是罪魁祸首。
item.description:
The number of bull sharks — one of the most aggressive species of shark in the world — increased significantly in a 20-year period, and researchers say warmer seawater is to blame. https://t.co/KdTaUhbGLA

— ABC News (@ABC) March 14, 2024

item.title: 美国司法部宣布，一名佛罗里达州男子因在哈马斯 10 月 7 日袭击以色列两周后给纽约市世界犹太人大会留下威胁性语音邮件而被判处六个月监禁。
item.description:
A Florida man was sentenced to six months in prison for leaving a threatening voicemail with the World Jewish Congress in New York City two weeks after Hamas' Oct. 7 attack on Israel, the Justice Department announced. https://t.co/ZxV1RhKZwA

— ABC News (@ABC) March 14, 2024

item.title: 美国前总统特朗普周四在佛罗里达州的一间法庭上，他的律师要求驳回他的联邦机密文件案。
item.description:
Former Pres. Trump was in a Florida courtroom Thursday, where his attorneys argued for the dismissal of his federal classified documents case.

The judge concluded the hearing without a ruling from the bench. https://t.co/88szhlSEbf pic.twitter.com/83UM4fvaR4

— ABC News (@ABC) March 14, 2024

item.title: 据当局称，一名 27 岁的佛罗里达州妇女被发现死于巴哈马的一艘游轮上。

item.title: 官员说，马萨诸塞州六名八年级学生因在群聊中发表 "仇恨和种族主义言论 "而面临刑事指控，据称这些言论包括威胁和模拟奴隶拍卖。
item.description:
Six Massachusetts eighth graders face criminal charges in connection with "hateful and racist comments" in a group chat that allegedly included threats and a mock slave auction, officials said. https://t.co/olQJ27NWzf

— ABC News (@ABC) March 14, 2024

item.title: 根据一份新的联邦报告，2023 年仍有 MIS-C 病例发生，而未接种疫苗或接种疫苗后免疫力下降的儿童患这种疾病的风险最高。
item.description:
Cases of MIS-C are still occurring in 2023 and children who are unvaccinated or have waning immunity from previous vaccination are at the highest risk of developing the condition, according to a new federal report. https://t.co/FJFYDxet2l

— ABC News (@ABC) March 14, 2024

item.title: "杀手真菌 "听起来像是科幻小说，但真菌感染每年造成全球约 170 万人死亡，比肺结核或疟疾的死亡人数还多。
item.description:
"Killer fungus" may sound like science fiction, but fungal infections kill an estimated 1.7 million people worldwide per year — more than tuberculosis or malaria. https://t.co/7TPnAS7KHg

— ABC News (@ABC) March 14, 2024

item.title: 副总统卡马拉-哈里斯（Kamala Harris）将于周四访问明尼苏达州的一家堕胎诊所，据信这是任何总统或副总统的首次此类访问。
item.description:
Vice Pres. Kamala Harris is visiting an abortion clinic in Minnesota on Thursday, a trip believed to be the first of its kind for any president or vice president. https://t.co/vnx3LK2mEI

— ABC News (@ABC) March 14, 2024

item.title: 联邦上诉委员会驳回了特朗普前顾问彼得-纳瓦罗（Peter Navarro）为推翻藐视国会的定罪而提出的避免入狱的请求。
item.description:
A federal appeals panel has rejected former Trump adviser Peter Navarro's bid to avoid reporting to prison as he works to overturn his contempt of Congress conviction. https://t.co/jEzqXo7bX6

— ABC News (@ABC) March 14, 2024

item.title: 美国太空探索技术公司（SpaceX）周四表示，该公司的 "星际飞船 "火箭在印度洋上空重返大气层时失去了联系，但第三次试飞仍被认为是成功的，因为它比之前的任何一次试飞都更进一步。
item.description:
SpaceX lost contact with its Starship rocket on reentry over the Indian Ocean, the company said Thursday, but the third test flight was still deemed a success as it advanced further than either of the previous tests. https://t.co/k8xt08r1tn pic.twitter.com/xekrV8v2lL

— ABC News (@ABC) March 14, 2024

item.title: 美国海军陆战队的一支反恐精锐部队乘直升机进入海地太子港，帮助保护美国大使馆的安全。尽管一场暴力帮派起义动摇了这个加勒比国家的现任政府，但美国大使馆依然开放。
item.description:
An elite, anti-terrorism unit of the U.S. Marines choppered into Port-au-Prince, Haiti, to help secure the U.S. embassy that remains open despite a violent gang uprising that has shaken the incumbent government of the Caribbean country. https://t.co/S8MWts6f2B pic.twitter.com/CnHtuQ6QrK

— ABC News (@ABC) March 14, 2024

item.title: 据当地官员称，一名警长周日清晨在纽约巴达维亚唐斯博彩酒店（Batavia Downs Gaming & Hotel）制止一起纠纷时遇袭身亡，目前已有两人被捕。
item.description:
Two arrests have been made following the death of a sergeant who was attacked and killed after breaking up a dispute early Sunday morning at New York’s Batavia Downs Gaming & Hotel, according to local officials. https://t.co/UJHkSERmUF pic.twitter.com/OP0oDFXh0Y

— ABC News (@ABC) March 14, 2024

item.title: 随着围绕凯特-米德尔顿的照片争议持续发酵，关于一张全家福照片编辑时间的新细节也浮出水面，由于担心照片被 "操纵"，这张照片后来被全球新闻机构撤回。
item.description:
As the photo controversy around Kate Middleton continues to grow, new details have emerged about the timing of edits on a family photo that was later retracted by global news agencies amid concerns it was "manipulated." https://t.co/kmgaka9wnL

— ABC News (@ABC) March 14, 2024

item.title: 女演员奥利维亚-蒙恩（Olivia Munn）公开了她与乳腺癌近一年的私下斗争，并透露她接受了四次手术，包括双乳切除术。
item.description:
Actress Olivia Munn is opening up about her nearly year-long private battle with breast cancer, revealing she underwent four surgeries, including a double mastectomy. https://t.co/VAyGDcCXOY pic.twitter.com/0edFbN2CTd

— ABC News (@ABC) March 14, 2024

item.title: 贾斯汀-汀布莱克（Justin Timberlake）不仅在即将发行的专辑中与 *NSYNC 重聚，还在周三晚于洛杉矶举行的演出中登台亮相。
item.description:
Justin Timberlake didn't just reunite with *NSYNC on his upcoming album — he also did it in onstage, at his show in Los Angeles on Wednesday night. https://t.co/tRM6J1O9xo pic.twitter.com/I8vl6XdJ5G
